using namespace std;
ll dp1[1002][10002],dp2[1002][10002];
int main() {
	ll n,t;
	cin >> n >> t;
	ll m[n],a[n];
	FOR(i,n) cin >> m[i];
	FOR(i,n) cin >> a[i];

	FL(i,1,n+1) {
		FL(j,1,t+1) {
			if(a[i-1] > j) {
				dp1[i][j] = dp1[i-1][j];
			}
			else {
				dp1[i][j] = max(m[i-1]+dp1[i-1][j-a[i-1]],dp1[i-1][j]);
			}

			if(a[i-1] > j) {
				dp2[i][j] = dp2[i-1][j];
			}
			else {
				dp2[i][j] = max(m[i-1]+dp2[i-1][j-a[i-1]],max(dp2[i-1][j],2*m[i-1]+dp1[i-1][j-a[i-1]]));
			}
		}
	}
	/*FL(i,1,n+1) {
		FL(j,1,t+1) cout << dp2[i][j] << " ";
		cout << endl;
	}*/
	cout << dp2[n][t] << endl;
	return 0;
}
